Posts.Content: hi  thank you for your reply .i did say that wrong , her cancer did start in her breast ,she has never had a mamogram ,when they found it it was gone to the brain .there were 2 brain tumors ,they took one .and they also found an anurisim in the brain witch they are not going to touch.we just found out this week that it has spread to her lungs ,,,bones and spine.concerned in newfoundland....
